SMC_GSentenceQueue.GetProgramName (METH)
SMC_GSentenceQueue.GetProgramName (METH)
Â¶
METHOD GetProgramName : STRING(255)
The name of the program or subprogram.
This is usually the full path of the CNC file.
E.g. for the file with full path â/some/dir/name.cncâ.

Name
Type
